item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_ancient_emper: Earth Golemancy summons a terracotta army
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_engraved_conc: Earth Golemancy summons two Concrete Golems
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_obsidian.name: Obsidian Skull Ring
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_obsidian.desc: Summon a sturdy Obsidian Golem with Earth Golemancy
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_gaia.name: Gaia's Anger
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_gaia.desc: When an Earth Golem is killed, there is a 10%% chance to trigger an earthquake
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_grass.name: Grass Woven Ring
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_glistering.de: Earth Golemancy always summons a Melon Golem which heals its owner during combat
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_forest_guardi: Earth Golemancy summons 2 Log Golems and 4 Leaf Golems
item.wizardrygolems\\:charm_dried_mushro: Earth Golemancy summons 3 Mushroom Golems with poisonous attacks
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_snare.name: Amulet of Brambles
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_snare.desc: Earth Golemancy golems leave 1-5 Snare traps behind if killed
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_deathweed.d: 10%% chance to activate Forest's Curse when an Earth Golemancy golem is killed (100%% chance in forests)
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_steaming_ne: Golems summoned by Fire Golemancy will explode when killed
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_smoldering.de: Fire Golemancy will summon a Magma Golem which can split into two when killed
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_flame_trail.d: Fire Golemancy minions set the ground under them on fire
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_charcoal.name: Charcoal Ring
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_charcoal.desc: Fire Golemancy will summon two Furnace Golems. The Golems must be fed with coal to operate. Every additional fuel after the first one increases the golem's lifetime by 10 seconds
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_fire_golem_du: Your Fire Golems have twice as long lifetime
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_flame_golem.d: Fire Golemancy will summon a Flame Golem\nFlame Golems wield powerful fire magic and they can imbue their owner's weapon with fire
item.wizardrygolems\\:charm_fire_goleman: Being near a Fire Golem while holding a Fire Staff will empower the caster's magic
item.wizardrygolems\\:charm_ifrit_bottle: Your Fire Golems gain a Fireskin effect. Being near a Fire Golem while holding a Fire Wand will grant you fire resistance
spell.wizardrygolems\\:earth_golemancy.d: Imbue the soil with life energy to form golems.
spell.wizardrygolems\\:earth_golemancy.l: Only a Master tier Earth Wand can summon an Obsidian Golem
spell.wizardrygolems\\:fire_golemancy.de: Draw power from the essence of Fire to create golems.
spell.wizardrygolems\\:fire_golemancy.lo: Only a Master tier Fire Wand can summon a Flame Golem
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_frostbite.des: Your Ice Golemancy golems have 50%% chance to apply Frostbite on hit
Your Ice Golems gain an Ice Shroud effect. Being near an Ice Golem while holding an Ice Wand will also grant you the effect
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_permanent_gol: Causes your next golem summoned by any golemancy spell to have unlimited lifetime.\nLimited to one entity at a time\n5 minutes cooldown
item.wizardrygolems\\:ring_snow_golem.de: Ice Golemancy summons 5 small snow golems
Ice Golemancy will summon a Winter Golem\nWinter Golems are powerful creatures of ice magic that can imbue their owner's weapon with the power of ice
Ice Golemancy golems have 50%% chance to shatter upon death
item.wizardrygolems\\:amulet_jagged_sapp: Ice Golemancy golems have 15%% chance to cast Ice Spikes under their target with each attack
Ice Golemancy golems spawn ice sigils when they are killed
This bottle contains Living Snow that can be placed. Living Snow summons allied Snow Golems if enemies are nearby. The bottle can be recharged at an Arcane Workbench
tile.wizardrygolems\\:living_snow.name: Living Snow
item.wizardrygolems\\:head_permafrost_cr: Ice Golemancy summons two permafrost golems that leave a trail of permafrost
item.wizardrygolems\\:belt_coldlink.name: Coldlink Belt
item.wizardrygolems\\:belt_coldlink.desc: Ice Golemancy golems heal you with each attack for a half heart if you have the Ice Shroud effect
spell.wizardrygolems\\:ice_golemancy.des: Draw power from the essence of Ice to create golems.
spell.wizardrygolems\\:ice_golemancy.low: Only a Master tier Ice Wand can summon a Winter Golem
